fields.message:
In the following area we’ve listed out all the different Page Types available within the Theme. We’ve also drawn up a visual guide of each Page for an easier editing process.  

Below is a short introductory video where we explain the processes involved.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zOurH7M8PQY" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
fields.label: Introduction to Page Settings
Display Logo inside Splash Screen
fields.name: flo-cube-pages__splash-logo-display
fields.instructions: You can setup the logo by going to Flotheme -> 3. Header

fields.message:
To create an About page:
  1. Go to Pages.
  2. Press the "Add New" button.
  3. On the right, in the "Template" field, select "4.1. About Page".
  4. Customize the page by using the provided settings and visual instructions.
fields.label: How to Create an About Page

fields.message:
To create an Contact page:
  1. Go to Pages.
  2. Press the "Add New" button.
  3. On the right, in the "Template" field, select "4.2. Contact Page".
  4. Customize the page by using the provided settings and visual instructions.
fields.label: How to Create a Contact Page

fields.message:
To create an Home page:
  1. Go to Pages.
  2. Press the "Add New" button.
  3. On the right, in the "Template" field, select "4.3. Home Page".
  4. Customize the page by using the provided settings and visual instructions.
fields.label: How to Create a Home Page

fields.message:
To create an Listing page:
  1. Go to Pages.
  2. Press the "Add New" button.
  3. On the right, in the "Template" field, select "4.4. Listing Page".
  4. Customize the page by using the provided settings and visual instructions.
fields.label: How to Create a Listing Page

fields.message: A Blog is a page that lists all of your blog posts. Thus, it is a page with a “4.4. Listing Page” template that is set up to list Blog Posts. You can find a video tutorial on how to set it up at Flotheme -> 4.4. Listing Page.
fields.label: About the Blog Page

sub_fields.label: Blog Post Overview
Default single post layout
sub_fields.name: flo-post__default-layout
sub_fields.instructions:
The selected layout will be used as default for the new created posts.
It does not affect the existing posts.

sub_fields.message: By clicking on this button, all the blog posts sidebars options will be updated to the values selected above

sub_fields.label: Auto set featured images
sub_fields.name: flo-cube-blog-post__auto-set-featured
sub_fields.instructions: In case featured image is not uploaded to the post/gallery, the first of the uploaded images will be set as featured image.

choices.no_responsive: Disable responsive images for all devices
choices.mobile_only: Allow responsive images only for mobile devices
choices.all_devices: Allow responsive images for all devices

sub_fields.label: Blog Post Responsive Images
sub_fields.name: flo-blog-post__responsive_images
sub_fields.instructions: You can control from here the responsive images introduced in WP 4.4. It is recommended to have the responsive images enabled, at least for the mobile devices. But this may affect image quality. If you disable the responsive images, then the quality will be good, but the performance will be affected, especially on mobile devices.

sub_fields.label: Title Block Overview

sub_fields.message: The title is the title of the post that is currently being edited.
sub_fields.label: A.2. Title

sub_fields.message: The excerpt is the excerpt of the post that is currently being edited.
sub_fields.label: A.3. Excerpt
4.6.2.1. Display Featured Image
sub_fields.name: flo-cube-blog-post__featured-image-display
sub_fields.instructions: The Featured Image setting can be found on right side of the blog post editing page.

sub_fields.message: Related posts are considered the posts with the same category.

A.0.1. Related Posts Block Title Font
sub_fields.name: flo-cube-blog-post__related-posts-block-title-font
sub_fields.__label: A.0.1. Related Posts Block Title Font

sub_fields.label: Type B. Overview

sub_fields.message: The content for this block can be set from the Post edit page.
sub_fields.label: A.1. Additional Information

sub_fields.message: The content for this block can be set from the Post edit page.
sub_fields.label: B. Text
4.6.4.3. Distance Below Post Images
sub_fields.name: flo-cube-blog-post__content-distance-below-images
sub_fields.instructions:
Set the vertical distance between images inserted in the post content
Default: 10px

sub_fields.label: Overview

sub_fields.message: In order to choose the comment type (WP or Facebook comments) go to 5. Generics -> 5.2. Comments Area
sub_fields.label: B. Comments

sub_fields.message: Pagination options can be modified by going to Flotheme -> 5. Generics -> 5.5. Miscelanious -> 1. Pagination.
sub_fields.label: C. Pagination

fields.message: A Portfolio is a page that lists all of your Portfolio Galleries. Thus, it is a page with a "4.4. Listing Page" template that is set up to list Portfolio Galleries. You can find a video tutorial on how to set it up at Flotheme -> 4.4. Listing Page.
fields.label: About the Portfolio Page

sub_fields.label: Portfolio Gallery Overview
Portfolio Categories Link Url (gallery category slug)
sub_fields.name: flo-portfolio-gallery__gallery-category-slug
sub_fields.__label: Portfolio Categories Link Url (gallery category slug)

sub_fields.label: Portfolio Tag Link Url (gallery tag slug)
sub_fields.name: flo-portfolio-gallery__gallery-tag-slug
sub_fields.__label: Portfolio Tag Link Url (gallery tag slug)

sub_fields.label: Above Overview
Under Overview

sub_fields.message: The Featured Image from the gallery will be used for this block.
sub_fields.label: Featured Image
A. Show categories on gallery pages
sub_fields.name: flo-cube-portfolio-gallery__show-categories
sub_fields.__label: A. Show categories on gallery pages

sub_fields.message: The title is the title of the gallery that is currently being edited.
sub_fields.label: B.1. Title

sub_fields.message:
The content is the text content from the editor present in the top section of the Gallery creation page.

The Fonts can be setup at Flotheme -> 8. Typography -> 8.1. Generic Typography
sub_fields.label: D. Content
Grid Overview
A.1. Thumbnail Custom Ratio
sub_fields.name: flo-cube-portfolio-gallery__grid-thumb-size-custom
sub_fields.instructions: The ratio should be specified by the following example: 1:1

sub_fields.message:
The Image Size is set in pixels, by the example: 600x400.
Note: the proper thumbnail size should be set considering the number of columns of the grid, and the screen resolution that the viewers of the grid will use. E.g. the thumbnail size for a grid of two columns should be bigger than the thumbnail size of a grid with 3 columns.

sub_fields.label: Nearby Overview
No Crop Overview
Slider Overview

sub_fields.message: This slideshow uses the entire windows width and thus will crop the image.
sub_fields.label: Note:

sub_fields.instructions: In order to choose the comment type (WP or Facebook comments) go to 5. Generics -> 5.2. Comments Area

sub_fields.instructions: The pagination type can be modified by going to Flotheme -> 5. Generics -> 5.5. Miscelanious -> 1. Pagination.
